version_description:
In-book search improvements, including the ability to see search results broken down by chapter.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

For customers who have linked their Goodreads and Amazon accounts, you can now post your Kindle notes and highlights to your friends and followers on Goodreads (US only).

You can now read using left-aligned (ragged right) text instead of justified
Performance and stability improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Now you can search for notes and highlights you’ve made in your book – just search for a word or phrase that's in the note or highlight to see a preview of it in the search results.

Goodreads Profile (US Only): Now it’s even easier to add friends on Goodreads. Visit your Goodreads profile to see your friend list, send and respond to friend requests, and add friends from Facebook. Activate your profile by linking your Goodreads accoun
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Introducing the all-new Kindle app with a brand new look built around the books you love.  Choose between the new light theme or existing dark theme.  Quickly navigate with one-tap access to the things you use most, including your most recent book.  With

Introducing the all-new Kindle app with a brand new look built around the books you love. Choose between the new light theme or existing dark theme. Quickly navigate with one-tap access to the things you use most, including your most recent book. With Goo

Tap and hold on a word or phrase to search for it and see where else it occurs in the book.

Notification Center now includes the ability to delete messages. To use this feature, tap on the "bell" icon at the top of your home screen and swipe left t
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
We’ve added support for the iPhone X, as well as several bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

* Split view on iPad is here! Resize the app to multi-task while reading without ever switching context.
* Try scrolling through your book – just like a web page. Turn continuous scrolling on via Settings, then easily turn it on and off from the Aa men

• Use the new Audible filter to quickly find audiobooks in your library.
• (US only) Visit your Goodreads profile in “More” to easily rate books and help friends find books they’ll love. This feature is coming in the next few weeks.
• Look up words
We fixed an issue with Speak Screen compatibility - now narration no longer skips paragraphs.

* Split view on iPad is here! Resize the app to multi-task while reading without ever switching context.
* Try scrolling through your book – just like a web page. Turn continuous scrolling on via Settings, then easily turn it on and off from the Aa men

* Return Prime Reading and Kindle Unlimited books from within the Kindle app. Simply long press on a book cover and select “Return book”.
* Read your favorite magazines in a new mobile-friendly format. Initial titles include Food Network, Cos
While reading with continuous scrolling, you can now select and highlight text. You can turn continuous scrolling on via Settings, then easily turn it on and off from the Aa menu in your book.

* Read with continuous scrolling by turning it on from the Aa menu in your book. This update also adds support for bookmarks while reading in continuous scrolling.
* A re-designed Notebook makes managing your notes and highlights easier.

* Read using the new green theme inside your book, available in the Aa menu.
* A re-designed X-Ray makes exploring the contents of your book easier.

* Read using the new green theme inside your book, available in the Aa menu.
* A re-designed X-Ray makes exploring the contents of your book easier.
You can now double tap to zoom in or pan across images while reading with continuous scrolling.

* More library filtering options are here! We’ve added Kindle Unlimited, Prime Reading, and sample filters to your library.
* We’ve moved Collections view to the View and Sort menu.

* More library filtering options are here! We’ve added Kindle Unlimited, Prime Reading, and sample filters to your library.
* We’ve moved Collections view to the View and Sort menu.
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.

In the coming weeks, you will see the following:
* Prime Reading and Kindle Unlimited Badges in your library to help you easily see which books you’ve borrowed.
* A new feature that makes navigating Search and X-ray results easier.
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.
In the coming weeks, you will see a Siri shortcut to open your most recently read book. Enable the custom voice command from your device’s Siri settings (iOS 12 only).
In the coming weeks, you will see a Siri shortcut to open your most recently read book. Enable the custom voice command from your device’s Siri settings (iOS 12 only).

* Set a reading goal for 2020 and see the books you finished in 2019 in your Reading Insights.
* Find recommendations, your recent reads, popular titles, and more on Home.
* Turn your favorite quote into an image, and share it with friends via socia
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.
Several experience improvements and bug fixes.

- Easily access all settings related to your reading in the updated Aa menu.
- When reading in continuous scroll, use a vertical navigation bar to explore your book without losing your place.
- Use the new Reading Ruler to gain focus and read more e
Improved dictionary lookup allows you to scroll lengthy definitions without leaving your book.
